category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QSEARCH_product_path_index_update_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Specifies the maximum number of BOMViewRevisions that should be processed in a single batch. A higher value will be more efficient, but will consume more memory. Any value less than one is considered to mean an unlimited batch size.
